review: It works well with Netflix and youtube on its own or iOS device.  However, there is no app for iOS yet to mirror the iOS device.  If you owns iphone, iPad, the only thing you can do with fire stick at this point is Netflix and youtube.  I am a bit disappointed and I won't recommend it for iOS user for now.
author: SG

review: Wow - really hyped up and very very very poor reception.  Have a small home and the only tv this will work on is the one that's in the same room as the router.  And instant video?  What a joke!  Sign up for hulu plus and watch all the current shows you want for $7.99 a month.  Amazon wants $1.99 an episode AFTER you pay the $99 a year fee.  Total ripoff as far as I'm concerned and would not recommend this product to anyone.  Save the $15 and buy the Chromecast - simple setup - no issues - get Hulu Plus!
